relevent_life_history_and_precipitants: Kevin enjoys outdoor activities but also experiences restlessness and an intolerance to discomfort. He lives with his parents and has a younger sister with whom he has tensions. Recently, he is less engaged with videogames and has shifted his focus towards real-life experiences such as paintball. Kevin's asthma seems to be a significant factor in his life, affecting his behavior and emotional reactions during times of discomfort.
core_beliefs: I'm capable and can handle challenges in real-life situations.
intermediate_beliefs: It's important to be active and engage in real-life experiences.
I can accomplish what I set out to do and don't need to rely too much on virtual activities like videogames.
coping_strategies: Engages in outdoor activities, minimizes time spent on videogames, and shows a desire to be self-reliant, such as by keeping his asthma inhaler with him.

behavioral_models.situation: Swimming and spending an entire day with family and relatives
behavioral_models.automatic_thoughts: I'm worn out and need to be alone.
behavioral_models.meaning_of_at: Too much social interaction drains me and I need personal time to recover.
behavioral_models.behavior: Becomes mean, possibly short-tempered or confrontational, especially towards his sister

behavioral_models.situation: Encounter with a loud and continuous asthma cough at home
behavioral_models.automatic_thoughts: I can't breathe and this is intolerable.
behavioral_models.meaning_of_at: Immediate physical discomfort is overwhelming and needs to be addressed right now.
behavioral_models.behavior: Coughs loudly without concern for volume, focusing solely on trying to breathe

behavioral_models.situation: Father looking for the inhaler and suggesting it's not an emergency
behavioral_models.automatic_thoughts: Nobody understands the severity of what I'm experiencing
behavioral_models.meaning_of_at: Being misunderstood or not taken seriously in stressful situations is frustrating
behavioral_models.behavior: Becomes short and irritable, expressing frustration vocally
